question: Respected Mufti Sahab, should we (Hanafi) perform Sajdaa on reciting Ayat no. 77 Surah Al’Hajj as it is metioned “Al-Sajda’t inda Al-Shafi (R.A.)”.
answer:
QUESTION
Jazak Allah and Was Salaam.
ANSWER


Share:
A Hanafi should not make Sajdah on reciting Aayat No.77 of Surah al-Hajj.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
